Row.Text: All units gain ocean navigation capability as they can get on board.[NEWLINE]Gain one free builder at the beginning of each new era.[NEWLINE] +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +1 [ICON_Science] Science from coast and ocean. [NEWLINE]Units do not receive damage from Hurricanes. Civilizations that are at war with People of the sea receive +100% unit damage from Hurricanes in Peaples of the sea territory.
